text:
Juno 23f 1954
Mr, Bernard Buck
Program Director
Radio Station WNTQ
Municipal Building
New York 7, N, Y.
Dear Bernie:
Thanks for the comment on John Kirk*s proposed
philosophy series. Ifm sending it on to Frank Schooley,
Hope your vacation was enjoyable. Things arc going
pretty well hero, thanks.
Best regards,
Sincerely,
JH:cp
John Holt
Network Manager
